talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(How did he know....!?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Hey, where are you going in such a hurry? Needless to say. You are overworking yourself for things that aren’t lucrative at all, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, just its name... What kind of place is it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
You poor little thing. Let me give you an interesting piece of information. Lately, the Red Lotus Palace story is causing a stir in Merca. Have you ever heard about it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Dream of Success$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>What have you been doing until now if you knew that…</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I knew it. What a helpless bumplin. The Grand Arena of Red Lotus Palace, where all kinds of heroes come together, is the securest road to success for ordinary people like us. It will lead us directly to the Army of Destruction!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>Well- Will you be able to endure it?</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
You fool! I never once told you that I wanted to end my life, but that I wanted to live an easy life!! Why would you think of going to such a scary place when you are a citizen of Merca, the peaceful neutral state?
I’ve received an offer to apply for the Arena. They will let me join the Army of Destruction if I make it through to round 3 at the Grand Arena.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(So he’s planning to take me to the Arena…)</FONT> Got it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Hahah! Bribe can be the solution for anything. Why are you looking at me llike that? This is what Mistland is all about. And I’m telling you this so that you can take this opportunity too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(I think I know who this fisherman is…)</FONT> Is he someone you know well?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
So go to Merca’s Port, find a fisherman fixing his little ship and deliver this to him. Take this chance to familiarise yourself with the man. Also, investigate if the work I’ve asked him to do is going smoothly.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hmm, okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Huh? We, well, of course I’ve known him for a long time and I consider him to be a trustworthy friend! He has often delivered his fishes to the Headquarters. A man you won’t be able to meet even in a thousand years, were it not for me.

$Guard Chiffe$
All right, I won’t fail this time!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Some guard has asked me to deliver this to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
Hm? Long time no see. Is there anything I can help you with?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you really know the Arena of the Red Lotus Palace well?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
Oh, I didn’t know you were an acquaintance of his...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m just curious.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
No, it isn’t exactly like that… Are you interested too? I hope you’re not.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m just here to deliver this to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
You should be already aware of it, but this kind of job requires me to do many other side jobs. I’m only introducing my acquaintances to each other, and I don’t want to receive any unnecessary attention. My, this is troublesome.

${user_nick}$
(This doesn’t feel good. I will warn Chiffe about it.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where did they go?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Headquarters Guard$
Ciffe? Someone came here looking for him, and they just left together a moment ago. If he doesn’t come back soon, it will be an absent without leave, which worries me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>그러죠. <FONT color=#662500>(Is it the Abandoned Wharf?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Headquarters Guard$
Well, I’m not sure but I think I heard his companion say the wharf. Since I can’t leave this place, could you go and find him?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Listen carefully)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(Chiffe and that fisherman are talking... Let’s eavesdrop on them)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
I made this clear from the beginning. That I’m doing this as an exception and that you must not involve others into this. Don’t you understand that everything will be in vain if the plan goes awry?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
But I just said only what was necessary for the errand... I didn’t know that friend would tell you something unnecessary. I said not to worry about anything...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
I think this is not a big issue for you, but I am doing this at a risk. If you are going to boast about it and just see what happens, you should quit this now before it is too late.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
All right, okay, I got it!! Stop getting mad at me and calm down. I won’t say anything to anyone, never again... And if you need more money, I’ll give it to you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(The two of them disappear in a hurry)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
The money is not the problem. Just get on the ship. I’ll take you to Merca's Heart. Please, be careful with what you say and don’t let this happen ever again.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That’s my line!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
My godness, what are you doing here!?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>And what are you guarding here?<FONT color=#662500> (I won’t let you fool me!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Well, I mean, I’m here because of my guard job....!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(I know it is a complete lie, but I can’t say anything)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
......Haven’t you heard that the security around the Abandoned Wharf has tightened? I was ordered by the President to patrol the area with the aid of a guard.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(Suddenly he’s become so confident.....!?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Tha, that’s right!! Someone like you would never know what it is to execute an official duty! How you dare to doubt an innocent public servant like me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(The two of them quickly disappear)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
......Well, you should return to your place of duty. Let’s hurry. I’ll see you again then.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I’m more curious about why the two of you are in this place.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
......And why are you here again......

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I heard you went absent without leave. That’s not good.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
We, well, of course it is because of my guard job....!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(His face turned black....)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
What?! Be careful with what you say!! I never went absent without leave. I just....!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(I know it is an obvious lie, but I can’t say anything)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
......Haven’t you heard that security has tightened because of all those merchandises that arrive to the Abandoned Wharf? We were ordered by the President to patrol the area in secret with the aid of the guards.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(He’s become so confident.....!?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Tha, that’s right!! Someone like you would never know what it is to execute a SECRET official duty! How you dare to doubt an innocent man like me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(The two of them quickly disappear)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Fisherman$
......The guards must return to their places of duty. Let’s leave now. I’ll see you again then.

$Headquarters Guard$
I’m gonna blow his head off when he returns...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(He’s such a bad actor)</FONT> I did, but... Do you know that person well?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Oh! {user_nick} Have you returned? What happened? Oh, by the way, I told you to deliver that thing to him. Did you deliver it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(Sigh, I can’t say something like he’s a secret agent of President Vernicka…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Why are you asking such a thing? I told you already. I haven’t known him for a long time, but he is a friendly guy who has many acquaintances. Then, let me ask you. Do you know him better than I do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>No, but…!!</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Anyways. What kind of unnecessary things did you say to him? Forget it. He got furious and said he would quit all this. So we will foget the whole thing. The same goes for you too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(You’re all lies!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I said forget it. You should be thankful that I’m generous enough to forgive you, even when you’ve ruined the whole thing. At least I will pay you since you’ve done the errand. Oh my, I’m such a kind man, don’t you think?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Receive Rewards)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Complete Quest$</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
Oh… I want to succeed in life!!

${user_nick}$
(I’m not sure if I should leave it like this. Let’s pretend not to know anything and go to meet him for now.)

${user_nick}$
(Though I think he will play innocent with me... But it can’t be helped.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… I did. But do you really know that man well?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Hey, {user_nick} You!! I gave you the job because I had trust in you, but you followed me!! You’ve disappointed me!! Did you really deliver the letter to him?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>At least I know that he is not to be trusted so easily.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Why are you asking that with such a serious face? I told you already. I haven’t known him for a long time, but he is a friendly guy who has many acquaintances. Then, let me ask you. Do you know him better than I do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I never once wanted to be part of this...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I see. You said unnecessary things to him when you gave him the letter, am I right? He complained me a lot about it. Forget it. I won’t force someone to do a job he or she doesn’t even want to. So forget the whole thing and stay out of this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#662500>(He’s trying to get away with this!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I said forget it. You should be thankful that I’m generous enough to forgive you, even when you’ve ruined the whole thing. At least I will pay you since you’ve done the errand. Oh my, I’m such a kind man, don’t you think?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Complete Quest$</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
Oh… I want to succeed in life!!

journal.title: Red Lotus Palace’s Arena
journal.contents:
Listen to the Red Lotus Palace’s story from Chiffe.

Merca's Heart - Guard Chiffe

journal.title: Strange Agent
journal.contents:
Find the Fisherman in Merca’s Port.

Merca’s Port - Merca's Fisherman

journal.title: Warning
journal.contents:
Return to Chiffe and talk to him.

Merca's Heart - ??
journal.todo_msg: Return to Chiffe and warn him.

journal.title: Tail
journal.contents:
Find the blacketeer with Chiffe.

Abandoned Wharf - ??
journal.destination: Track down Chiffe at the Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Wharf and find Chiffe

journal.title: Working Together with Different Goals
journal.contents:
Return to Chiffe and talk to him.

Merca's Heart Guard Chiffe
journal.todo_msg: Return to Chiffe and warn him.
